mapper.select: select r.exercise_record_seq, r.user_seq, r.exercise_seq, r.exercise_time, r.exercise_date, e.excercise_name, (exercise_time*excercise_kcal) as excercise_kcal from tb_exercise_record r inner join tb_exercise e on r.exercise_seq = e.excercise_seq where to_char(exercise_date, 'yyyy-mm-dd') = to_char(#{exerciseDate}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') and user_seq = #{userSeq} order by r.exercise_date
select * from tb_exercise where excercise_name like '%'||#{excerciseName}||'%'
